data.name: XGraphics
desc: provides the basic output operation of a device.

methods.name: copy
desc: copies a rectangle of pixels from another device into this one.

methods.name: draw
desc: draws a part of the specified bitmap to the output device.

methods.name: drawArc
desc: draws an arc (part of a circle) in the output device.

methods.name: drawChord
desc: draws a chord of a circular area in the output device.
A chord is a segment of a circle. You get two chords from a circle if you intersect the circle with a straight line joining two points on the circle.

methods.name: drawEllipse
desc: draws an ellipse in the output device.

methods.name: drawGradient
desc: draws a color dispersion in the output device.

methods.name: drawLine
desc: draws a line in the output device.

methods.name: drawPie
desc: draws a circular area in the output device.

methods.name: drawPixel
desc: sets a single pixel in the output device.

methods.name: drawPolyLine
desc: draws multiple lines in the output device at once.

methods.name: drawPolyPolygon
desc: draws multiple polygons in the output device at once.

methods.name: drawPolygon
desc: draws a polygon line in the output device.

methods.name: drawRect
desc: draws a rectangle in the output device.

methods.name: drawRoundedRect
desc: draws a rectangle with rounded corners in the output device.

methods.name: drawText
desc: draws text in the output device.

methods.name: drawTextArray
desc: draws texts in the output device using an explicit kerning table.

methods.name: getDevice
desc: returns the device of this graphics.

methods.name: getFontMetric
desc: returns the font metric of the current font.

methods.name: intersectClipRegion
desc: builds the intersection with the current region.

methods.name: pop
desc: restores all previous saved settings.

methods.name: push
desc: saves all current settings (Font, TextColor, TextFillColor, LineColor, FillColor, RasterOp, ClipRegion).

methods.name: selectFont
desc: creates a new font and sets the font.

methods.name: setClipRegion
desc: sets the clip region to specified clipping.

methods.name: setFillColor
desc: sets the fill color.

methods.name: setFont
desc: sets the font used by text operations.

methods.name: setLineColor
desc: sets the line color.

methods.name: setRasterOp
desc: sets the raster operation.
If the device does not support raster operations then this call is ignored.

methods.name: setTextColor
desc: sets the text color used by text operations.

methods.name: setTextFillColor
desc: sets the fill color used by text operations.
